assertionResults.fullName: RBAC System can function admin permissions should allow admin to perform all actions on vendors
assertionResults.title: should allow admin to perform all actions on vendors

assertionResults.fullName: RBAC System can function admin permissions should allow admin to perform all actions on users
assertionResults.title: should allow admin to perform all actions on users

assertionResults.fullName: RBAC System can function admin permissions should allow admin to manage all production entities
assertionResults.title: should allow admin to manage all production entities

assertionResults.fullName: RBAC System can function admin permissions should only allow admin to read audit logs
assertionResults.title: should only allow admin to read audit logs

assertionResults.fullName: RBAC System can function viewer permissions should only allow viewer to read and list entities
assertionResults.title: should only allow viewer to read and list entities

assertionResults.fullName: RBAC System can function viewer permissions should have no create, update, or delete permissions for any entity
assertionResults.title: should have no create, update, or delete permissions for any entity

assertionResults.fullName: RBAC System can function viewer permissions should be able to view all operational data but not modify
assertionResults.title: should be able to view all operational data but not modify

assertionResults.fullName: RBAC System can function operator permissions should allow operator to create/update vendors but not delete them
assertionResults.title: should allow operator to create/update vendors but not delete them

assertionResults.fullName: RBAC System can function operator permissions should only allow operator to view users
assertionResults.title: should only allow operator to view users

assertionResults.fullName: RBAC System can function operator permissions should allow operator to manage production entities
assertionResults.title: should allow operator to manage production entities

assertionResults.fullName: RBAC System can function operator permissions should only allow operator to view costs
assertionResults.title: should only allow operator to view costs

assertionResults.fullName: RBAC System can function operator permissions should allow operator to create and view reports but not delete them
assertionResults.title: should allow operator to create and view reports but not delete them

assertionResults.fullName: RBAC System can function should return false for invalid roles
assertionResults.title: should return false for invalid roles

assertionResults.fullName: RBAC System can function should return false for entities not in permissions
assertionResults.title: should return false for entities not in permissions

assertionResults.fullName: RBAC System getPermissions should return all permissions for admin
assertionResults.title: should return all permissions for admin

assertionResults.fullName: RBAC System getPermissions should return all permissions for operator
assertionResults.title: should return all permissions for operator

assertionResults.fullName: RBAC System getPermissions should return empty array for invalid role
assertionResults.title: should return empty array for invalid role

assertionResults.fullName: RBAC System getAllowedActions should return all actions admin can perform on vendors
assertionResults.title: should return all actions admin can perform on vendors

assertionResults.fullName: RBAC System getAllowedActions should return limited actions operator can perform on vendors
assertionResults.title: should return limited actions operator can perform on vendors

assertionResults.fullName: RBAC System getAllowedActions should return empty array for invalid combinations
assertionResults.title: should return empty array for invalid combinations

assertionResults.fullName: RBAC System hasAccess should return true when role has any access to entity
assertionResults.title: should return true when role has any access to entity

assertionResults.fullName: RBAC System hasAccess should return false when role has no access
assertionResults.title: should return false when role has no access

assertionResults.fullName: RBAC System getAccessibleEntities should return all entities admin can access
assertionResults.title: should return all entities admin can access

assertionResults.fullName: RBAC System getAccessibleEntities should return entities operator can access
assertionResults.title: should return entities operator can access

assertionResults.fullName: RBAC System getAccessibleEntities should return empty array for invalid role
assertionResults.title: should return empty array for invalid role

assertionResults.fullName: RBAC System isAdministrativeRole should identify admin as administrative
assertionResults.title: should identify admin as administrative

assertionResults.fullName: RBAC System isAdministrativeRole should identify operator as non-administrative
assertionResults.title: should identify operator as non-administrative

assertionResults.fullName: RBAC System isAdministrativeRole should identify viewer as non-administrative
assertionResults.title: should identify viewer as non-administrative

assertionResults.fullName: RBAC System canPerformBulkOperations should allow admin to perform bulk operations
assertionResults.title: should allow admin to perform bulk operations

assertionResults.fullName: RBAC System canPerformBulkOperations should not allow operator to perform bulk operations
assertionResults.title: should not allow operator to perform bulk operations

assertionResults.fullName: RBAC System canPerformBulkOperations should not allow viewer to perform bulk operations
assertionResults.title: should not allow viewer to perform bulk operations

assertionResults.fullName: RBAC System getRoleLevel should return correct levels for each role
assertionResults.title: should return correct levels for each role

assertionResults.fullName: RBAC System getRoleLevel should return 0 for invalid roles
assertionResults.title: should return 0 for invalid roles

assertionResults.fullName: RBAC System hasHigherPermissions should correctly compare role permissions
assertionResults.title: should correctly compare role permissions

assertionResults.fullName: RBAC System RBAC Matrix Validation should have consistent matrix structure
assertionResults.title: should have consistent matrix structure

assertionResults.fullName: RBAC System RBAC Matrix Validation should ensure admin has more permissions than operator
assertionResults.title: should ensure admin has more permissions than operator

assertionResults.fullName: RBAC System RBAC Matrix Validation should validate audit log restrictions
assertionResults.title: should validate audit log restrictions

assertionResults.fullName: RBAC System RBAC Matrix Validation should validate operator restrictions on critical entities
assertionResults.title: should validate operator restrictions on critical entities
